author: Minou Clark
title: 'Pretty Little Liars' Star Lucy Hale Lands Role In A New Show
text:
'Pretty Little Liars' Star Lucy Hale Lands Role In A New Show New year, new show. 
‚Äú Pretty Little Liars ‚Äù star Lucy Hale has a new project in the works post-Rosewood. 
According to Entertainment Weekly , she‚Äôs set to star in a dark comedy for The CW called ‚ÄúLife Sentence.‚Äù Beyond thankful for new ventures and opportunities !! üôèüèº https://t.co/OHJx4I9Npw ‚Äî Lucy Hale (@lucyhale) January 31, 2017 
The show is about a girl with terminal cancer who lives her final days to the fullest only to discover she actually isn‚Äôt sick. Now, she must somehow cope with the life choices she made when she was living each day as if it were her last. 
It certainly sounds like an interesting plot with a lot of twists and drama in the works. We‚Äôll be keeping an eye out! Related...
